thread.title: Algeria: State to Support Education Sector Despite Decline in Hydrocarbon Revenues, Stresses Sellal

title: Algeria: State to Support Education Sector Despite Decline in Hydrocarbon Revenues, Stresses Sellal
text:
Nigeria: House Leadership Crisis - Counter Claims Trail Oyegun's Meeting With Reps 
"If we want a strong economy, the challenge to meet will be the training of human resources and national potential," he said. 
Commenting on the conference that coincides with the entry into university of the reform promotion, he explained that the goal is "to provide an objective assessment and not come out with a new reform" adding that this reform is meant to "improve performance." 
"We cannot go back," insisted the Prime Minister, recalling "there have been many palpable achievements." 
Sellal explained, in this regard, the school's mission to is teach elementary students "how to learn and how todo" while inculcating the "sense of constructive criticism" to train the Algerian pupils on citizenship. Algeria
